title: experienced toplaner looking for a student
body:
Hey there! I've been playing league since season 2 fairly actively.

These days I am studying law and realy lack the time to grind a lot so I usually stuck at d3-4.

Still I used to teach a dude and got him from silver to platin within 2 months.

General

I'd just like to answere questions, teach you the ways of top and stuff. I dont play boring champs, that is why I never will reach the peaks of high elo. I am only playing for enjoyment.

I am not professional at training, nor do I have many thoughts about how to go about it exactly.

The idea of teaching someone just intrigues me

Soo I am not gonna teach you tanks, I am gonna teach you how to carry games from bronce to platin.

I am not planning to sit down with you for 8 hours everyday and do "training".

I am planning to do 2 hour sessions every 3-4 days and see how you're holding up. watch some replays, play some games and make comments/suggestions( I see this more as a project, than an event)

About me--

I am german, 20, male, pretty ironic and casual. Been talking english within the confines of the internet since I was 10.

As a result I am pretty fluent in english and I do enjoy talking.



If you are interested, there are some basic requirements. (Gaming)

Around silver/gold and have alteast 2.5-3 years of experience at playing league. I can't hope to teach you how to carry if you can't lasthit, don't have a generell "feel" for the game and just don't know the champs. A stable ping would most certainly be helpfull aswell ;).
You also gotta be ready to play atleast 3 ranked soloq games everyday( of course its fine if something like exams/gf pop up) and play on euw.
And you can't be a 1trick
( Being a 1trick is all about NOT understanding the game but somehow squeezing your way through the elo with barely "passing" grades)


Furthermore; ( Personal)

Atleast 18, talktative, positive minded ( you can get mad that is not a problem; I am no saint myself. I am talking about your generell attidude towards gaming and life overall)

I am doing this for fun and if you are painfull to be around with, that would truly suck. ( just being honest)

I wouldn't mind at all if we just talk about some personal stuff throughout the sessions aswell, there's no rush. Befriending eachother does improve the whole teacher setup a lot and I would also enjoy getting to know you better :D


either fluent english or german is desperately required.



Looking forward to meeting you, just pm me privately in case you are interested( I do not know whether this will get any attention at all though :D)



ps: sry for typos, didn't proove read.
